unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Police Tickets | 1 of 2
question_text: X 1 2 3 4 5 6 P(X) 0.04 0.11 0.33 0.35 0.14 0.03 A local police officer gives out between $1$ and $6\text{ tickets a day}$ , the probability distribution table of which is shown above, where $X$ is the number of tickets handed out on any given day. What is the probability the officer gives out at least $4\text{ tickets}$ on any given day?
